title: Telemetry Quality Manifest Schema
description: Defines critical fidelity bounds for TIVS validation.

max_latency_ms.description: Maximum permissible age of the freshest data point (milliseconds).

source_non_repudiation_required.description: Must ingress feeds carry verifiable cryptographic signatures.

sensor_variance_tolerance_pct.description: Maximum percentage deviation allowed between redundant sensor feeds.

required_sources_online.description: Mandatory list of active data sources required for TQM satisfaction.
